subcategory.name: Paid Advertising on social media
response: The ideal posting frequency on social media channels can vary depending on several factors such as your audience, industry, and the platform you're using. Here are some general guidelines for posting frequency on popular social media platforms:/n 1. Facebook: Aim to post 1-2 times per day to maintain visibility without overwhelming your audience. Avoid overposting as it can lead to a decrease in engagement./n2. Instagram: Posting frequency on Instagram can vary depending on your content strategy and audience engagement. Aim for at least 3-5 times per week to stay active and maintain engagement.
